sub_title: Freelance Communications & Event Manager | Available from mid August
summary:
Freelance Communications & Event specialist with an international marketing background in the fashion, design and consumer lifestyle industry. A creative juggler characterised by a hands-on mentality and a keen eye for detail, with 10+ years experience working across Europe, Americas and Asia. 
Excels in fast-paced and result driven environments. International profile who lived and worked abroad in Vienna and Brussels. 

Specialties: 
Event Management 
Public Relations 
Community Management
Brand Communications
Social Influencer Marketing 
Content Creation 
Brand Partnerships  
Stakeholder Management

Are you looking for an experienced freelance Events or Communications specialist and would you like to grab a (digital) coffee to learn more about me? Please send me a DM, I'd love to get in touch.

authors.headline: Freelance Communications & Event Manager | Available from mid August

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the events planning, creation and production of all internal and external
events from online webinars to offline client seminars and employee celebrations with 300+ attendees. Being part of the business development, marketing and communications team, stakeholder management was a crucial part of the daily operations.
profile_positions.title: Event Manager a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Samy Alliance offers complete marketing and communication services including: Influencer Marketing, market research and intelligence, data and analytics, social media, digital content, creativity, communication, and public relations.

With over 300 employees and 15 offices in 15 countries in Europe, the US and Latin America, Samy Alliance operates in 55 markets for 100+ AAA customers such as L’Oreal, Disney, Unilever, and Nestle, developing award winning end-to-end digital campaigns based on data, strategy and creativity.

Samy Alliance was recently named one of Europe’s Top 1000 fastest-growing companies by the Financial Times for the third consecutive year.
profile_positions.title: Brand Strategy Team Leader - Benelux

profile_positions.description: Managed the opening of blended co-working and event space DB55 at the Amsterdam Houthavens. I acted as Venue Manager and was responsible for the daily operations, events programming and partnerships with the tenants in the building.
profile_positions.title: Brand Partnerships & Events

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the brand communications strategy of MEOW; a tech startup that connects professionals with high-end hotels for an exceptional coworking environment, founded by D/DOCK. Managed brand partnerships with high-end five-star hotels and was involved in the creation of brand assets and photography.
profile_positions.title: Brand Partnerships & Events

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for developing and driving the Global PR & Communications strategy across Europe, America and Asia across all Clarks brands, with a focus on Clarks Originals. 

- Develop the Global and European seasonal PR and communications strategy, aligned with the overall business objectives. 
- Develop, manage and execute PR plans for premium Clarks Originals collaborations with brands such as Carhartt WIP, Patta, Supreme, Stüssy, OVO, Neighborhood etc., including launch events, press outreach and global influencer programs and social content creation. 
- Create and manage seasonal influencer and talent programs for Clarks Originals, focusing on cult and youth profiles.  
- Create and manage seasonal influencer campaigns for Clarks Kids and Clarks, focusing on mommy and lifestyle influencers. 
- Manage and oversee the execution of seasonal PR events and activations in key cities worldwide i.e. in-store product launches, experiential fashion week events, celebrity dressing and influencer gifting and seeding programs. 
- Involved in the selection process and execution of celebrity campaigns with Alexander Skarsgard and Freida Pinto. 
- Manage 8 in-market PR agencies across Europe and UK and work closely with the regional PR teams in America and Asia on seasonal activation calendars to ensure global PR consistency across brands. 
- Manage planning and buying of Global branded content and media partnerships. 
- Work closely with the Clarks Originals Brand, Product, Social Media and Merchandise teams to align on seasonal planning. 
- Manage Global and European PR budget.
profile_positions.title: Global Communications & PR Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for driving the European PR and communications strategy across all European markets (UK, Spain, Germany, France, Italy, Russia, Sweden and The Netherlands) across all Clarks brands (Clarks, Clarks Originals and Clarks Kids). 
 
- Develop the seasonal European PR and communications strategy, aligned with the global PR strategy and overall business objectives. 
- Create seasonal activation plans in close collaboration with the in-market PR agencies, aligned with the European and global PR strategy.
- Create and manage seasonal influencer campaigns and programs for Clarks, Clarks Kids and Clarks Originals. 
- Manage and execute seasonal PR events and activations in European key cities i.e. seasonal press days, product and collaboration launches, fashion week events, celebrity gifting and influencer seeding.  
- Manage 5 in-market PR agencies across Europe and UK. 
- Work closely with the European Media Manager and European Digital Marketing Manager on the media planning and execution and development of the seasonal Consumer Marketing plans.  
- Plan and manage European PR budget.
profile_positions.title: Communications & PR Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for day-to-day contact with national and international consumer brands accounts in the food & beverage and travel industry.

Clients included: Starbucks Coffee Company, Booking.com, Heineken, Nationale Nederlanden and Nederlandse Brouwers. 

- Creation and execution of strategic PR activation plans for national and international clients 
- Develop and manage social influencer campaigns, content creation and contract management 
- Brand PR, press office, executive profiling and crisis communication for corporate client
- Management and execution of PR events and press outreach
- Creation of press releases, media alerts, PR calendars, and toolkits 
- Media planning and execution
profile_positions.title: Senior PR Consultant

profile_positions.description: Responsible for all marketing and PR activities of D/DOCK, a globally operating design studio for interior design and concept development, i.e. developing marketing plans, writing press releases and articles, increasing press coverage (off- and online), liaising with clients and press and developing communication plans for respected clients such as Google, Philips, NH Hotels and Sonos. Responsible for organizing events and securing interviews and media appearances to grow the brand awareness of the company.
profile_positions.title: PR & Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Five months travel through Vietnam, Laos, Cambodia, Thailand, Indonesia and Singapore.
profile_positions.title: Traveling - South East Asia

profile_positions.description: Responsible for general management support, i.e. welcoming clients, studio planning, budgetary control, organizing business trips and PA tasks for the management board. I was in charge of administrative and HR activities i.e. the creation of a HR manual, working conditions and contracts, while working together with the financial department to monitor budgets.
profile_positions.title: Office Manager

company.name: Starwood Hotels & Resorts Worldwide, Inc. Divisional Office Europe, Africa and Middle East

profile_positions.description: As an extention of my traineeship, I was involved in the organization of Starwood’s yearly Round Tables event in Greece. More than 700 Starwood associates attended this three-week event. I was involved in the creation and execution of the ‘Crisis Communication’ workshop and assisted in speech writing and other related PR activities. During the event, I worked closely with the president of Starwood EAME and acted as his ghostwriter on social media.
profile_positions.title: Communication and PR assistant

profile_positions.description: As a trainee I supported the F&B department, which is worth over 1.4 billion dollars and supports close to 1.000 F&B venues throughout the division. I was responsible for various dedicated projects and tasks such as organizing a four-day F&B Academy course, collecting and analyzing key sales data and rolling out new F&B initiatives. I worked closely with the Senior Vice President while acting as his PA and supported the Director of F&B in the creation of new restaurant concepts via extensive research and trend analysis.
profile_positions.title: Food and Beverage Management Trainee

profile_positions.description: As all-round F&B employee I was responsible for welcoming guests and delivering five star indigenous service.
profile_positions.title: Allround F&B employee
